name: Telogis
overview:
Leading Global Platform for Location Based Services Telogisâ€™ product portfolio consists of a comprehensive wireless fleet management solution for fleets and a robust, proprietary mapping solution for fleet management companies and other telematics OEMs, enterprise users and systems integrators.

Telogis Fleet, the Companyâ€™s GPS-based fleet productivity and management platform is a scalable, easy-to-use, Software as a Service (â€œSaaSâ€) solution for fleets. Its ease of use has allowed Telogis Fleet to achieve a significantly high adoption rate among its fleet management customers. Telogis Fleet enables fleet managers to improve productivity and reduce operating costs by providing secure, remote access to real-time GPS vehicle and driver information as well as providing dispatch and route optimization and handheld products for fleet optimization

Telogis acquires mobile resource and fleet management solutions business of Intergis

milestones.description: Telogis Acquires Mobile Resource and Fleet Management Solutions Business of Intergis
milestones.source_description: Telogis Acquires Mobile Resource and Fleet Management Solutions Business of Intergis

milestones.source_text: Ford Motor Co. and Telogis, Inc. today announced that Ford is joining with Telogis, a location intelligence business, to provide fleet customers with a telematics solution for fleet operations. The next-generation Crew Chief powered by Telogis is available at all Ford dealers in North America. Ford aims to bring its fleet customers a premium location-based platform that makes their fleets safer, greener and more efficient.
